description: Hand behind opponent's neck controlling head position common wrestling/clinch position
key_points: Hand behind neck cupping|Forearm blocks shoulder|Control head position|Set up attacks

description: Arm under opponent's armpit with hand on their back establishing inside position
key_points: Arm under armpit|Hand on back|Fight for inside position|Double unders dominant

description: Both arms under opponent's armpits establishing dominant clinch position
key_points: Both arms under|Hands clasped on back|Dominant position|Set up throws or takedowns

description: Controlling opponent's arm with both hands at wrist and tricep for attacks
key_points: One hand on wrist|Other on tricep|Control arm completely|Attack from position

description: Arm over opponent's arm hooking above elbow for control and defense
key_points: Hook over arm above elbow|Drive hip into opponent|Defensive and offensive|Counter underhook

description: Using whizzer/overhook to defend single leg and other attacks
key_points: Hook opponent's arm|Drive hip into them|Prevent finish|Create space to escape

description: Primary defense to leg attacks driving hips back and down explosively
key_points: Drive hips back and DOWN|Chest on opponent's back|Hips low|Follow up with control
common_mistakes: Hips not back|Not down|Too slow|Too high

description: Controlling opponent's head from front with arm around neck for attacks
key_points: Arm around neck|Chin strap or gable grip|Control head down|Attack or transition

description: Battle for inside position exchanging underhooks with opponent
key_points: Swim arms for position|Fight for underhooks|Stay active|Win inside battle

description: Pulling opponent's arm across body to get behind them or set up attacks
key_points: Control at wrist and tricep|Pull arm across body|Get behind or attack|Quick movement

description: Snapping opponent down from clinch to force turtle position
key_points: From collar tie|Snap head down forcefully|Opponent goes to turtle|Attack turtle

description: Fundamental stance and base for defending takedowns while standing
key_points: Athletic stance|Weight balanced|Ready to sprawl|Hands ready

description: Using hip to block throws and certain takedown attempts
key_points: Hip into opponent|Block their hip entry|Prevent throw|Create space

description: Defending cross face or collar control attempts while standing
key_points: Frame on shoulder/neck|Create space|Maintain posture|Counter or escape

description: Double collar tie from Muay Thai controlling opponent's head completely
key_points: Both hands behind neck|Fingers interlaced|Pull head down|Complete control

description: Arms wrapped around opponent's torso for takedowns or control
key_points: Arms around torso|Hands clasped|Hips in|Drive for takedown

description: Guillotine choke while both fighters are standing
key_points: Wrap neck from front|Secure grip|Jump guard or finish standing|Squeeze

description: Anaconda choke setup from standing front headlock position
key_points: Thread under armpit|Around neck|Grip and drop|Finish choke

description: Position and grips to set up knee tap takedown from clinch
key_points: Control at collar or head|Ready to tap knee|Steering opponent|Quick attack

description: Defending arm drag attempts to prevent opponent getting behind
key_points: Strong arm|Recover quickly|Turn with drag|Prevent back exposure
